pass_1_identification.step: Scan within the image for separately defined/delimited table styled elements.

table_criteria.criterion: Minimum 3 rows and 2 columns of data
Cells contain single data points or short phrases

context_check.step: Analyze text immediately before and after the potential table, to help you. Don't return that text, just keep it in your mind.
Reject if part of a larger text section like references or appendix

full_table_capture.step: If a table is verified, capture all related rows and columns within the table element according to the format provided to you within the XML tags.
